channel.title: Porter Robinson and Madeon - Shelter (Eswyn Cover) [Cover, WIP]
channel.description:
I recently fell in love with one particular track: Porter Robinson (and Madeon’s) Shelter. I’ve been listening to it repeatedly, so I decided to do a cover of it. I’m still working on it, but I’d like to hear what you think! Also since I’m posting the project file, I’d appreciate it if you didn’t post/publish it anywhere as I’ve worked really hard on it and it’s not done. Thanks!
If anyone would be willing to collaborate on a track in this style (Porter Robinson-esque Future Bass) please let me know as I’d absolutely love to work on that kind of track.
https://app.auxy.co/projects/_fhm032fUViXLVIwcsUh-Q==

item.title: Porter Robinson and Madeon - Shelter (Eswyn Cover) [Cover, WIP]
item.dc:creator: Eswyn
item.description:
Yeah uh… I tend to be a bit of a perfectionist. But getting it so accurate feels AMAZING! Especially the pitched toms building up to the drop. That felt awesome to get right.

Also I doubt you’re bad. Don’t be so harsh on yourself! If you have some ideas feel free to send them to me!

Read full topic
